snippet.title: Making a Polished Game in 48 Hours
snippet.description:
📜 Sign up for our newsletter - https://mailchi.mp/b879ea8646d1/pure-jam-games-newsletter
🎮 Check out our games - https://purejamgames.itch.io/
💬 Join the conversation on Discord - https://discord.gg/rJ6TWt4
🐦 Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/PureJamGames
📧 Email us directly - PureJamGames@gmail.com

👍 Like and subscribe to keep updated :)

A post-mortem on our experience from several game jams, with a focus on GMTK 2020. Why Can't I Just Speak Normally to my High School Crush (AKA Kouhai Quest) placed #63 Overall out of 4500 games in the GMTK 2020 game jam, and was ranked #8 for Presentation and #13 for Originality.

~~Table of Contents~~
0:00 - Game Demo
0:23 - Intro
0:57 - Idea Generation
3:33 - Executing on the idea (MVP for Designers/Programmers)
5:50 - Executing on the idea (MVP for Artists)
7:34 - Outro

~~Credits~~
Art and Video by Kotocca
Bensound - Jazz Comedy (https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/jazz-comedy)
Bensound - Hip Jazz (https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/hip-jazz)

~~Other Links~~
Kotocca's Twitter - https://twitter.com/Kotocca
Dan's Portfolio - https://www.danielpodlovics.com/projects
